meanings.definition: A deeply distressing or disturbing experience.
meanings.sent1: The child had many traumas from the scary movie.
meanings.sent2: She sought therapy to heal from past traumas.
meanings.sent3: The traumas of losing his favorite toy were quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent4: The traumas of war lingered in his memories like dark shadows.
meanings.sent5: The traumas of the accident haunted her dreams every night.

meanings.definition: Emotional shock following a stressful event or a physical injury.
meanings.sent1: The traumas of the car crash left him shaken.
meanings.sent2: Recovering from emotional traumas takes time and support.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated reaction to the spilled milk was quite the trauma.
meanings.sent4: The traumas of rejection felt like a punch to the heart.
meanings.sent5: The traumas of the earthquake rattled the entire community.
